column3: Label describing qualities of a specific observation.

column2: Endosteal surface bone formation characteristics label

column3: Label indicating if a pathological process was still active at time of death.

column2: Boundaries well defined, but no sclerosis

column3: Label describing characteristics of diffues lesions.

column3: Label indicating that cortical thinning resulting from an imbalance of bone formation and resorption in connection with diffuse lesions is observed.

column3: Label describing the size of observed features in terms of diameter.

column3: Label describing the degree of bony spur or osteophytic development.

column2: Sharp ridge, sometime curled with spicules

column2: Change in shape of vertebra label
